snippet.title: Scars of Mars - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Scars of Mars is a sci-fi real-time tactical RPG developed by Acquire Corp. After a research facility on Mars loses contact, players will take on the role of a human commander of a robotic unit on a mission to rescue survivors and escape. Assemble a party of four humanoid robots, combining different classes and equipment to fit the desired playstyle, then engage enemies in quick real-time combat. Scars of Mars is launching in 2024 for PC.

#ScarsOfMars
